MaxiCharger AC Home 50A - EV Charger With Separate Holster
The MaxiCharger Home 50A AC Hardwired EV Charger is a 240V-50 Amp Level 2 Smart Charger compatible with all EV and Hybrid Plug-in vehicles. It features a sleek contemporary design in dark gray and is installable indoors or outdoors.
Price
1 999 $
The MaxiCharger Home 50A AC Hardwired EV Charger is a 240V-50 Amp Level 2 Smart Charger compatible with all EV and Hybrid Plug-in vehicles. It features a sleek contemporary design in dark gray and is installable indoors or outdoors.

The MaxiCharger Home 50A offers adjustable charging up to 50 Amps and features a 25ft long Universal (J1772) Charging Cable with side holster and cable management unit.

The MaxiCharger Home 50A AC Hardwired EV Charger is a 240V-50 Amp Level 2 Smart Charger compatible with all EV and Hybrid Plug-in vehicles. It features a sleek contemporary design in dark gray and is installable indoors or outdoors.

The MaxiCharger Home 50A offers adjustable charging up to 50 Amps and features a 25ft long Universal (J1772) Charging Cable with side holster and cable management unit.

Andrew Szajlai
3 January
Highly recommend well designed, sleek and modern charger with high-quality materials. Professional installation is a must and the ability to accommodate a 50AMP circuit only way to optimize use (check your breaker box for capacity and room.) Easy to download and connect app allows visibility to progress of charging. I look forward to additional OTA updates and capabilities.
